Best game i played ever  . EVER !
МАСТ ХЕВ НАМБА ВАН , ИГРА ГОДА !
This is one my favorite games of all time. Everybody should play this game
I love this shooting game, even it is an old game.
It's my favorite game and the best game
an oldie but still a goodie
Old but Gold! Simple mechanics, lots of mods, and a great game to blow off some steam.
Muito Bom, Sem palavras!!!Me Gusta Muito!!!

Самый лучший FPS шутер на все времена.
schon seit 10 jahren und immer noch bock drauf
le mieur danne le monde :p <3 b1 sure avec cs:golobal offansive <3 :p

Jeżeli lubisz gry FPS i chcesz ze mną postrzelac pisz śmialo! Moja ulubiona czesc CS'a, od 1.5, aż po GO. CS 1.6 jest niewiele lepszy od 1.5, co prawda w 1.5 był inny model noża, i tekstury wyglądały jak piksele. =D

I still think this is the best version of any of the Counter-Strikes out there, and it's been a decade since it came out.

Yeah, it's lacking graphics compared to the newer ones running newer versions of the engine. So what? Just got back on it recently and I'm realizing how much I've missed it.
O jogo mais foda que tem \o/

Fajna gra.
Fajne są modyfikacje do tej gry typu - deathrun, surf, codmod, diablo mod i wiele innych.
Nic dodać, nic ująć. :)
Tylko jest jeden minus silnika gold source :( np. na IHD 2000 na latarce są spadki fps na opengl, na sofcie ich nie ma, ale jest stałe 60 fps a d3d nie ma na steamie :(
Одна из моих самых любимых игр!
cs 1.6 is probably the best yet team based fps game, go is a step up from source but its a very debatable topic that it is AS good as 1.6. Definately not better though.
is the best game in the world have fun ;)
Jogo muito acessível de jogar! Aproveitam-no ;)
